Hi hi! 

Are you referring to the snapping when you click on the star? That's intended for this game mode, so that no one is overlapping one another. Each Star Guardian is 'snapped' into a spot when channeling!
No, I'm talking about the moddle that glitches after using redemption, if you look closely on Soraka's model, it just freezes, but keeps on moving :)

Oh, oh! I'll have to look into this one; I'm not sure what would be causing this. Looking at Serebrii's comment, I think they're right, in that it has to do with the revive animation for this game mode. I can poke the team who worked on the game mode and see if this is something that's on their radar.

It seems like the models get stuck sometimes after reviving an ally.
